latex:
Let $ f(x) = \log_{10} (\sin (\pi x)\cdot\sin (2\pi x)\cdot\sin (3\pi x) \cdots \sin (8\pi x))$. The intersection of the domain of $ f(x)$ with the interval $ [0,1]$ is a union of $ n$ disjoint open intervals. What is $ n$?\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ 2 \qquad \textbf{(B)}\ 12 \qquad \textbf{(C)}\ 18 \qquad \textbf{(D)}\ 22 \qquad \textbf{(E)}\ 36$
